mapper.select: SELECT YEAR ,HAKGI ,HAKGWA ,HAKNYEON ,DEPTNAME ,ENTR_AMT ,EDU_AMT ,STD_AMT1 ,STD_AMT2 ,STD_AMT3 ,HOUSE_AMT ,FOOD_AMT ,REMARK FROM ST_REGIST_AMT WHERE ifnull(YEAR,' ') LIKE CONCAT('%', #{ST_REGIST_AMT.year}, '%') AND ifnull(HAKGI,' ') LIKE CONCAT('%', #{ST_REGIST_AMT.hakgi}, '%') AND ifnull(HAKGWA,' ') LIKE CONCAT('%', #{ST_REGIST_AMT.hakgwa}, '%') AND ifnull(HAKNYEON,' ') LIKE CONCAT('%', #{ST_REGIST_AMT.haknyeon}, '%') ORDER BY YEAR DESC, HAKGI, HAKGWA, HAKNYEON
